channel.title: Comments for page "Water Clone Technique"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Water Clone Technique"

item.title: Possible Trainers
item.content:encoded: Can anyone check if Z-Dog is the trainer for this jutsu? I don't have access to him to check for myself, but Zabuza used this technique in Naruto, so it'd make sense for Z-Dog to teach it in BvS.
